mapper.select: /*retrieveTrwiBudgList*/ SELECT yy , sum(MM_EXP) as totMmExp FROM iris_tss_gen_trwi_budg_edit_info GROUP BY yy

-- retrieveTrwiBudgDtl SELECT isnull('${yy}' , yy) as yy , isnull( dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('EXP_SCN_CD' , Substring(cm.COM_DTL_CD,0,3)) , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('EXP_SCN_CD' , Substring(bi.EXP_SCN_CD,0,3)) ) as lgExpScnNm , isnull( cm.COM_DTL_CD ,bi.EXP_SCN_CD ) as expScnCd , cm.COM_DTL_NM as expScnNm , isnull( MM_EXP , 0) as mmExp ,PSNN_RISN_PRO as psnnRisnPro ,PCE_RISN_PRO as pceRisnPro FROM iris_tss_gen_trwi_budg_edit_info bi RIGHT OUTER JOIN IRIS_ADM_COM_CD cm ON bi.EXP_SCN_CD = cm.COM_DTL_CD
AND yy = '${yy}'
WHERE cm.COM_CD_CD = 'EXP_SCN_CD' AND len(cm.COM_DTL_CD)>2
mapper.update: -- saveTrwiBudg GRS 템플릿등록 MERGE iris_tss_gen_trwi_budg_edit_info WITH (HOLDLOCK) AS A USING (SELECT #{yy} AS yy , #{expScnCd} AS EXP_SCN_CD) AS B ON A.yy = B.yy AND A.EXP_SCN_CD = B.EXP_SCN_CD WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( YY --년도 , PSNN_RISN_PRO --인건비상승율 , PCE_RISN_PRO --물가상승율 , EXP_SCN_CD --비용구분코드 , MM_EXP --비용 , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 ) VALUES ( #{yy} , CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{psnnRisnPro} = '' THEN '1' ELSE #{psnnRisnPro} END) , CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{pceRisnPro} = '' THEN '1' ELSE #{pceRisnPro} END) , #{expScnCd} , CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{mmExp} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{mmExp} END) , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.MM_EXP = CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{mmExp} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{mmExp} END) , PSNN_RISN_PRO = CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{psnnRisnPro} = '' THEN '1' ELSE #{psnnRisnPro} END) , PCE_RISN_PRO = CONVERT(numeric(20,6), CASE WHEN #{pceRisnPro} = '' THEN '1' ELSE #{pceRisnPro} END) , A.LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , A.LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} ;
